an3.8:4.1: “A fool is known by three things.
an3.8:4.3: Hurtful deeds by way of body, speech, and mind. … An astute person is known by kind deeds by way of body, speech, and mind.
an3.8:4.4: These are the three things by which an astute person is known.”
an3.8:5.1: So you should train like this:
an3.8:5.2: ‘We will do away with the three qualities by which a fool is known, and we will undertake and implement the three qualities by which an astute person is known.’
